conclusion: Analyze the flow path of the liquid from each inlet (A, B, and C) to the containers.
It flows down the black baffle.
The black baffle directs the liquid towards the left side of the container.
The liquid will flow into container D.
It flows down the purple baffle.
The purple baffle directs the liquid towards the center of the container.
The liquid will flow into container E.
It flows down the cyan baffle.
The cyan baffle directs the liquid towards the right side of the container.
The liquid will flow into container F.
Liquid from A flows into container D.
Liquid from B flows into container E.
Liquid from C flows into container F.
The liquid will flow into containers D, E, and F from A, B, and C respectively.
